title: Understanding Restraint
text: Restraint involves using physical or mechanical means to limit a person's movement. It is often used in situations where a client poses a risk to themselves or others.

hintAnswer: technique where physical or mechanical means restrict a client’s movement
title: Identifying Restraint Techniques
text: Which of the following describes a restraint technique?
choices: Confining a client in a room from which the client cannot freely exit, used when the client poses an immediate danger to themselves or others
technique where physical or mechanical means restrict a client’s movement
the structured evaluation of the risk factors associated with a person’s potential for engaging in a $$life-threatening$$ behavior, such as suicide
